---
title: SWIID Version 8.3 is available!
author: Frederick Solt
date: '2020-05-19'
slug: swiid-version-8_3
categories:
  - update
  - r
  - swiid
description: "Version 8.3 of the SWIID is now available! This new release adds to its source data 4759 new Ginis since version 8.2..."
---

::: {.cell}

:::

Version 8.3 of the SWIID is [now available](/swiid/swiid_downloads/)! This new release:

-   adds to [its source data](https://github.com/fsolt/swiid/blob/master/data/swiid_source.csv) 4759 new Ginis since version 8.2, including newly available LIS data on [Chile, Denmark, Germany, Mexico, Peru, Slovenia,](https://www.lisdatacenter.org/news-and-events/2019-winter-data-release/) [Belgium, Canada, the Czech Republic, Italy, and---for the first time---Palestine](http://www.lisdatacenter.org/news-and-events/2020-spring-data-release/); and

-   includes estimates of market and disposable income inequality for 188 more country-years than version 8.2.

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/plot-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

For more details, you can check out the all the R and Stan code used to generate the estimates [in the SWIID GitHub repository](https://github.com/fsolt/swiid). As always, I encourage users of the SWIID to [email me](mailto:frederick-solt@uiowa.edu) with their comments, questions, and suggestions.
